task_summary: Validate a plan contract and demonstrate deterministic tool execution
assumptions: The tool registry contains echo_tool and get_time
The executor enforces dependency resolution and produces execution_results
risks: Unknown tools may cause a step to fail and block downstream steps
Unknown dependencies may block execution at planning time or during execution

steps.title: Emit a deterministic preflight note
steps.description: Use echo_tool to record a stable preflight message for traceability.
steps.deliverable: A preflight note captured via echo_tool output.
steps.acceptance: execution_results contains step_1 with ok=true and output.echo equals the provided text.

args.text: Preflight: validate contract fields and dependency semantics.

steps.title: Query current time from tool
steps.description: Call get_time to obtain the current time in a JSON-safe format.
steps.deliverable: A JSON-safe timestamp returned by get_time.
steps.acceptance: execution_results contains step_2 with ok=true and output is JSON-safe.

steps.title: Summarize the run deterministically
steps.description: Use echo_tool to summarize what was executed and what outputs were produced.
steps.deliverable: A summary note captured via echo_tool output.
steps.acceptance: execution_results contains step_3 with ok=true and output.echo includes references to step_1 and step_2.

args.text: Summary: executed step_1 preflight, step_2 get_time, and produced JSON-safe outputs.
